name: Endless Growth
description:
Follow the short story of Tiny, a genetically engineered slime, who managed to escape from the laboratory. Shortly after escaping, Tiny realized he just could not stop growing! If Tiny tried really hard they could shrink, but they could only shrink so much. Quickly, get Tiny to the shrinking machine before their size destroys the entire building!

Controls
A, D - Move left and right
W - Jump
R - Restart level
Left Click - Shrink
Escape - Main menu

A short platformer that was made for ZenoJam 3, all assets were made by me in under 72 hours.

This was both my first ever time participating in a game jam, and also my first ever game that I finished. While I did have two previous attempts, this is the only game that has been finished and was completely functional.

Notes:
All levels start paused, so that you don't start growing before you're ready.
The wall climbing is sometimes inconsistent, for best results jump at the wall from a distance, don't start beside the wall.
